channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- WebSphere Automation
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- WebSphere Automation

item.title: CVE-2024-28775|2024-08-02T00:56:58.164Z -- ibm -- websphere%20automation
item.description: IBM WebSphere Automation 1.7.0 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 285648.

item.title: CVE-2024-28764|2024-08-02T00:56:58.145Z -- ibm -- websphere%20automation
item.description: IBM WebSphere Automation 1.7.0 could allow an attacker with privileged access to the network to conduct a CSV injection. An attacker could execute arbitrary commands on the system, caused by improper validation of csv file contents. IBM X-Force ID: 285623.

item.title: CVE-2024-28764|2024-06-04T18:03:11.147Z -- ibm -- websphere%20automation
item.description: IBM WebSphere Automation 1.7.0 could allow an attacker with privileged access to the network to conduct a CSV injection. An attacker could execute arbitrary commands on the system, caused by improper validation of csv file contents. IBM X-Force ID: 285623.

item.title: CVE-2024-28775|2024-06-04T18:03:31.315Z -- ibm -- websphere%20automation
item.description: IBM WebSphere Automation 1.7.0 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 285648.
